Message:
A puppet devoid of emotions
can’t use magic powers.

My plan to turn this
homunculus into a witch
was experiencing setbacks.

One day, the Pope
visited my laboratory.

I had no idea what would bring
the supreme authority of the
Church of Longinus here,

but she was shockingly
well-versed in my field of work.

Witches and angels.
The heart and the soul...

What sounded like myths
the Church would preach
about recounted our world
in incredible detail.

Within each of us exists a soul,
and angels reside in
the heavens above.

They all seemed like works of
fiction written by a child,
but what if they were true...?

I formulated a completely new
theory based on these myths,

and I saw magic powers finally
manifest in my new specimen.
